name: GoKarts
description:
Game about racing. 

Game is in heavy development and you find bugs and lots of things to add to the game.  The game only haves Finnish translation due it being one of my school projects.

List of up coming updates.

-Timer & Lap counter

-Scoreboard

-Save game (So you can flex your friends about your lap time)

Leave suggestion under commends i will gratefully take them.
